channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Forgotten “FLOOD” road signs not collected, 2nd November
item.description:
2 FLOOD signs which have been in situ for the last 2 weeks still not collected & now older children are messing around them them. They are also now blocking the pavements.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farrant Avenue, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 2nd November
item.description:
New sign - wrong way round Lovely new sign - installed the wrong way round. Keep in low gear should face up the hill as the old one! not down hill.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked, 2nd November
item.description:
The drain on church street is still blocked and 2PIGS pub at risk of MORE water ingress. now also there is a large amount of fat on top of drain which is making the road and pavements slippery and dangerous. you can see the tide line of fat when the water receded a little in the day with no rain. this is the 3rd week of blocked drain but the fat is new and future concern.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 2nd November
item.description:
customer has called in and has mentioned that it is riddled in potholes.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrect Height shown on Bridge signs, 2nd November
item.description:
All the bridge height signs on this whole stretch of road need replacing, they all say 14' until you get to the bridge and the sign on the bridge says 13'9". I was delayed again today by a truck trying to turn round at Gotherington Nurseries having come up to the bridge that they couldn't get under. This has been reported previously
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin full again, 2nd November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Church Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham

item.title: Pot hole on right hand pathway walking out from the car park, 2nd November
item.description:
The pothole is in the pavement. I caught my foot in it, stumbled and fell to the ground carrying my 2.5year old sleeping toddler, damaging my knee, pulling my stomach muscles and shoulder trying to protect her
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5a, Bath Terrace, Naunton, Cheltenham
